title: Compare Kirchner and Leger response to modern city

content.question: The work on the left is Ernst Ludwig Kirchner’s Street, Dresden (1908). The work on the right is Fernand Léger’s The City (1919).Both works show interpretations of the modern urban environment in the early twentieth century. Using specific evidence, analyze how the works reflect the artists’ contrasting interpretations of the modern urban environment.

frqParts.text: The work on the left is Ernst Ludwig Kirchner’s Street, Dresden (1908). topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
